name: Elephants Don't Play Videogames After Dark
name_original: Elephants Don't Play Videogames After Dark
description:
Created for the 33rd GMC Jam!

The sequel everybody has been waiting for is here!
When Kid Elephant finally gets his hands on Cactus People 7, he wants to stay up all night and play! Unfortunately for him, his mom has other plans.

by @willthetarget (Twitter) and @KaraLynn.Cosplay (Instagram)
